_sText:
surf_ace

Tier: 2

Stages: 8

Stages flow together! I tried making a map that is enjoyable for absolutely everyone (people brand new to surf and people that enjoy going for times and routing)

Remake of my surf_nexus. I was embarrassed that I had released a tribute map that was half-assed. Gave it a more interesting design (including particles!) and a new bonus (made by Syncronyze)

This map is a sneak peak to some features/ideas I will be using in my next big project. So look out for that!

Map done quickly: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-sPghmFR6WI

One stage at a time: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y0B1bAwlNWk

Server owners please contact me for zoning information.

CS:GO VERSION (updated Jan 30 2015 - please use v2, server admins!):

https://www.dropbox.com/s/r9vx5szgdlzwbuu/surf_ace_fix.rar?dl=0 http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=381131175

Please add comment with your thoughts on the map!
